title: ﻿क्या आरएसएस कार्यकर्ताओं ने ओडिशा के तूफान पीड़ितों की मदद की?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim:
While TV channels were busy with Rahul Gandhi, Gujarat, Aurangzeb, Padmavati, Dilli smog… RSS volunteers were silently helping the victims of Cyclone Ockhi in TN. 



They were doing rescue work, distributing eatables and comforting the people most affected. pic.twitter.com/uAl0omMmmT
